forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of gray wraps the city, a soft blanket of cloud that patiently lingers like a shy friend waiting to be invited in. Beneath the muted light, the temperature hovers near a crisp 63, dipping ever gradually as the hours turn to afternoon. The gentle whispers of the southwest wind carry a promise of more chill to come with an evening low settling around 52. Although the clouds impart an ethereal glow to the skyline, the presence of fog on the fringes hints at the marine layer's encroaching grip, discreetly wrapping around the Golden Gate and caressing the bay.

The day’s offerings compel introspection—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the rhythm of the water mirrors the subdued hues above. Or a quiet moment in a cozy café, savoring a warm drink as the world bustling outside fades into a blur of soft shadows. Attire should lean towards comfort, perhaps a layer or two more than usual, wrapping oneself in light knits or an unassuming sweater, ensuring one is sheltered against the coolness of the afternoon without sacrificing ease. In this tranquil, cloudy interlude, simplicity reigns—embrace the day as it unfolds lazily, a gentle reminder of life’s quieter moments.
